name: freesounds dark
css:
@-moz-document domain("freesound.org") {
#container,
input,
.search-tagcloud,
.sample_player_small div.sound_tags ul li,
select,
.pagination .current-page,
#wrapper,
body,
#latest_forum_posts li,
#latest_forum_posts .even
{background-color: black;}

#header,
#account_nav,
#search_form,
#site_nav .active_tab a,
#site_nav li a,
#search input,
body,
#footer_wrapper,
#footer,
#single_sample_player,
.tags li a,
#comments_container,
#sound_information_box,
#sound_links,
#share_links,
#flag_sound,
.content_box,
.continuous_sidebar_box,
.continuous_sidebar_box #support,
.sidebar_box,
#donation_box,
#latest_forum_posts a.more_posts_button,
#post_it
{background: black;}

input,
body,
.sample_player_small .description,
.sample_more_search_results, 
select,
#site_nav li a,
.pagination .current-page,
#footer_credits,
#comments li,
#flag_sound,
.blog_post p,
#post_it h2
{color: gray;}

#filter_query_display,
.star-rating
{display: none;}

#header,
#site_nav .active_tab a,
#site_nav li a
{margin: 0;}

#container,
#search_form,
#single_sample_player
{border: 0;}

.pagination .current-page,
#latest_forum_posts .even,
#latest_forum_posts li
{border-color: black;}
}
